trans-unit.source: Represents an XML element that specifies a binding used to communicate with WS-I Basic Profile 1.1-conformant Web Services like ASMX-based services or to accept messages from ASMX-based clients.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BasicHttpBindingElement"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BasicHttpBindingElement"></xref> class with a name.
The name of the binding element.
Gets the type of the binding element.
A type that specifies the binding element.
Initializes this binding configuration element with the content of the specified binding collection.
Gets or sets whether MTOM or text/XML is used to encode SOAP messages.
The value of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSMessageEncoding"></xref> that indicates that MTOM or text/XML is used to encode SOAP messages.
Called when the content of a specified binding collection is applied to this binding configuration element.

Gets a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref> instance that contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref> objects that can be attributes or <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> objects of this binding configuration element.

A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref> instance that contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref> objects that can be attributes or <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> objects of this binding configuration element.
Gets or sets the type of security to be used with this binding.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BasicHttpSecurityElement"></xref> that specifies the type of security to be used with this binding.
